sections.heading: Effect
sections.text: of premarital agreement between decedent and surviving spouse.

sections.heading: Surviving
sections.text: spouse and minor children entitled to homestead and provisions.

sections.heading: Setting
sections.text:
apart exempt personal property and homestead; setting aside or administration

of remaining assets.

sections.heading: Court
sections.text:
authorized to make family allowance from estate if property set apart is

insufficient; where persons have other support.

sections.heading: Estates
Estates
sections.text:
not exceeding certain amounts: Transfer of assets without issuance of letters

of administration or probate of will; affidavit showing right to assets.
